subject: Attachments
author: Jim
full_text:
Hi Guys, 
Now I know just enough about computers to be dangerous (to my repairman), this ain't no joke...just ask him (when he ain't busy) :) 
So HOW is it that you guys are adding your EVP examples as an ATTACHMENT? Looks all nice and neat. And doesn't take up File Storage Space I "assume". Definitely much better to have it all on one page instead of running to my folder. Can send as personal text. Thanks. **I've received quite a few EVP lately. DR60 and Sony B7
